metadata.title: Human Coronavirus NL63 Is Not Detected in the Respiratory Tracts of Children with Acute Kawasaki Disease

abstract.original_text: HCoV-NL63/NH in a nasopharyngeal swab. These data do not support an association between these HCoVs and KD.

sentences.segment_text: HCoV-NL63 / NH in a nasopharyngeal swab .
These data do not support an association between these HCoVs and KD .
